snippet: Roger Federer won his record 40th match at the ATP final, defeating Janko Tipsarevic, 6-3, 6-1, in his opening match in London.
abstract: Roger Federer wins his record 40th match, defeating Janko Tipsarevic, 6-3, 6-1, at the ATP final in London.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer won his record 40th match at the ATP final, defeating Janko Tipsarevic, 6-3, 6-1, in his opening match in London.

headline.seo: Roger Federer Defeats Janko Tipsarevic in Opener at ATP Final
headline.main: Federer Defeats Tipsarevic in Opener at ATP Final
